00055   
00056   void process_event(EventPtr &event_ptr) {
00057     int32_t error;
00058     uint8_t *ptr = event_ptr->message + 4;
00059     size_t remaining = event_ptr->messageLen - 4;
00060     uint32_t offset, len;
00061     if (remaining == 0)
00062       cout << "success" << endl;
00063     else {
00064       while (remaining) {
00065         if (!Serialization::decode_int(&ptr, &remaining, (uint32_t *)&error) ||
00066             !Serialization::decode_int(&ptr, &remaining, &offset) ||
00067             !Serialization::decode_int(&ptr, &remaining, &len)) {
00068           HT_ERROR("Response Truncated");
00069           break;
00070         }
00071         cout << "rejected: offset=" << offset << " span=" << len << " " << Error::get_text(error) << endl;
00072       }
00073     }
00074   }
00075 
00076 }

00078 RangeServerCommandInterpreter::RangeServerCommandInterpreter(Comm *comm, Hyperspace::SessionPtr &hyperspace_ptr, struct sockaddr_in addr, RangeServerClientPtr &range_server_ptr) : m_comm(comm), m_hyperspace_ptr(hyperspace_ptr), m_addr(addr), m_range_server_ptr(range_server_ptr), m_cur_scanner_id(-1) {
00079   HqlHelpText::install_range_server_client_text();
00080   return;
00081 }

00084 void RangeServerCommandInterpreter::execute_line(const String &line) {
00085   int error;
00086   TableIdentifier *table = 0;
00087   RangeSpec range;
00088   TableInfo *table_info;
00089   std::string schema_str;
00090   std::string out_str;
00091   SchemaPtr schema_ptr;
00092   hql_interpreter_state state;
00093   hql_interpreter interp(state);
00094   parse_info<> info;
00095   DispatchHandlerSynchronizer sync_handler;
00096   ScanBlock scanblock;
00097   int32_t scanner_id;
00098   EventPtr event_ptr;
00099 
00100   info = parse(line.c_str(), interp, space_p);
00101 
00102   if (info.full) {
00103 
00104     // if table name specified, get associated objects
00105     if (state.table_name != "") {
00106 #if defined(__APPLE__)
00107       boost::to_upper(state.table_name);
00108 #endif
00109       table_info = m_table_map[state.table_name];
00110       if (table_info == 0) {
00111         table_info = new TableInfo(state.table_name);
00112         if ((error = table_info->load(m_hyperspace_ptr)) != Error::OK)
00113           throw Exception(error, std::string("Problem loading table '") + state.table_name + "'");
00114         m_table_map[state.table_name] = table_info;
00115       }
00116       table = table_info->get_table_identifier();
00117       table_info->get_schema_ptr(schema_ptr);
00118     }
00119 
00120     // if end row is "??", transform it to 0xff 0xff
00121     if (state.range_end_row == "??")
00122       state.range_end_row = Key::END_ROW_MARKER;
00123 
00124     if (state.command == COMMAND_LOAD_RANGE) {
00125       RangeState range_state;
00126 
00127       cout << "TableName  = " << state.table_name << endl;
00128       cout << "StartRow   = " << state.range_start_row << endl;
00129       cout << "EndRow     = " << state.range_end_row << endl;
00130 
00131       range.start_row = state.range_start_row.c_str();
00132       range.end_row = state.range_end_row.c_str();
00133 
00134       range_state.soft_limit = 200000000LL;
00135 
00136       m_range_server_ptr->load_range(m_addr, *table, range, 0, range_state, 0);
00137 
00138     }
00139     else if (state.command == COMMAND_UPDATE) {
00140       TestSource *tsource = 0;
00141       
00142       if (!FileUtils::exists(state.input_file.c_str()))
00143         throw Exception(Error::FILE_NOT_FOUND, std::string("Input file '") + state.input_file + "' does not exist");
00144 
00145       tsource = new TestSource(state.input_file, schema_ptr.get());
00146 
00147       uint8_t *send_buf = 0;
00148       size_t   send_buf_len = 0;
00149       DynamicBuffer buf(BUFFER_SIZE);
00150       ByteString key, value;
00151       size_t key_len, value_len;
00152       bool outstanding = false;
00153 
00154       while (true) {
00155 
00156         while (tsource->next(key, value)) {
00157           key_len = key.length();
00158           value_len = value.length();
00159           buf.ensure(key_len + value_len);
00160           buf.addNoCheck(key.ptr, key_len);
00161           buf.addNoCheck(value.ptr, value_len);
00162           if (buf.fill() > BUFFER_SIZE)
00163             break;
00164         }
00165 
00169         if (buf.fill()) {
00170           std::vector<ByteString> keys;
00171           struct ltByteString ltbs;
00172           uint8_t *ptr;
00173           size_t len;
00174 
00175           key.ptr = ptr = buf.base;
00176 
00177           while (ptr < buf.ptr) {
00178             keys.push_back(key);
00179             key.next();
00180             key.next();
00181             ptr = key.ptr;
00182           }
00183 
00184           std::sort(keys.begin(), keys.end(), ltbs);
00185 
00186           send_buf = new uint8_t [ buf.fill() ];
00187           ptr = send_buf;
00188           for (size_t i=0; i<keys.size(); i++) {
00189             key = keys[i];
00190             key.next();
00191             key.next();
00192             len = key.ptr - keys[i].ptr;
00193             memcpy(ptr, keys[i].ptr, len);
00194             ptr += len;
00195           }
00196           send_buf_len = ptr - send_buf;
00197           buf.clear();
00198         }
00199         else
00200           send_buf_len = 0;
00201 
00202         if (outstanding) {
00203           if (!sync_handler.wait_for_reply(event_ptr))
00204             throw Exception(Protocol::response_code(event_ptr), (Protocol::string_format_message(event_ptr)));
00205           process_event(event_ptr);
00206         }
00207 
00208         outstanding = false;
00209 
00210         if (send_buf_len > 0) {
00211           StaticBuffer mybuf(send_buf, send_buf_len);
00212           m_range_server_ptr->update(m_addr, *table, mybuf, &sync_handler);
00213           outstanding = true;
00214         }
00215         else
00216           break;
00217       }
00218 
00219       if (outstanding) {
00220         if (!sync_handler.wait_for_reply(event_ptr))
00221           throw Exception(Protocol::response_code(event_ptr), (Protocol::string_format_message(event_ptr)));
00222         process_event(event_ptr);
00223       }
00224       
00225     }
00226     else if (state.command == COMMAND_CREATE_SCANNER) {
00227       ScanSpec scan_spec;
00228 
00229       range.start_row = state.range_start_row.c_str();
00230       range.end_row = state.range_end_row.c_str();
00231 
00235       scan_spec.row_limit = state.scan.limit;
00236       scan_spec.max_versions = state.scan.max_versions;
00237       for (size_t i=0; i<state.scan.columns.size(); i++)
00238         scan_spec.columns.push_back(state.scan.columns[i].c_str());
00239       if (state.scan.row != "") {
00240         scan_spec.start_row = state.scan.row.c_str();
00241         scan_spec.start_row_inclusive = true;
00242         scan_spec.end_row = state.scan.row.c_str();
00243         scan_spec.end_row_inclusive = true;
00244         scan_spec.row_limit = 1;
00245       }
00246       else {
00247         scan_spec.start_row = (state.scan.start_row == "") ? 0 : state.scan.start_row.c_str();
00248         scan_spec.start_row_inclusive = state.scan.start_row_inclusive;
00249         scan_spec.end_row = (state.scan.end_row == "") ? Key::END_ROW_MARKER : state.scan.end_row.c_str();
00250         scan_spec.end_row_inclusive = state.scan.end_row_inclusive;
00251       }
00252       scan_spec.interval.first  = state.scan.start_time;
00253       scan_spec.interval.second = state.scan.end_time;
00254       scan_spec.return_deletes = state.scan.return_deletes;
00255 
00258       m_range_server_ptr->create_scanner(m_addr, *table, range, scan_spec, scanblock);
00259 
00260       m_cur_scanner_id = scanblock.get_scanner_id();
00261 
00262       ByteString key, value;
00263 
00264       while (scanblock.next(key, value))
00265         display_scan_data(key, value, schema_ptr);
00266 
00267       if (scanblock.eos())
00268         m_cur_scanner_id = -1;
00269 
00270     }
00271     else if (state.command == COMMAND_FETCH_SCANBLOCK) {
00272 
00273       if (state.scanner_id == -1) {
00274         if (m_cur_scanner_id == -1)
00275           throw Exception(Error::RANGESERVER_INVALID_SCANNER_ID, "No currently open scanner");
00276         scanner_id = m_cur_scanner_id;
00277         m_cur_scanner_id = -1;
00278       }
00279       else
00280         scanner_id = state.scanner_id;
00281 
00284       m_range_server_ptr->fetch_scanblock(m_addr, scanner_id, scanblock);
00285 
00286       ByteString key, value;
00287 
00288       while (scanblock.next(key, value))
00289         display_scan_data(key, value, schema_ptr);
00290 
00291       if (scanblock.eos())
00292         m_cur_scanner_id = -1;
00293       
00294     }
00295     else if (state.command == COMMAND_DESTROY_SCANNER) {
00296 
00297       if (state.scanner_id == -1) {
00298         if (m_cur_scanner_id == -1)
00299           return;
00300         scanner_id = m_cur_scanner_id;
00301         m_cur_scanner_id = -1;
00302       }
00303       else
00304         scanner_id = state.scanner_id;
00305 
00306       m_range_server_ptr->destroy_scanner(m_addr, scanner_id);
00307       
00308     }
00309     else if (state.command == COMMAND_DROP_RANGE) {
00310 
00311       range.start_row = state.range_start_row.c_str();
00312       range.end_row = state.range_end_row.c_str();
00313 
00314       m_range_server_ptr->drop_range(m_addr, *table, range, &sync_handler);
00315 
00316       if (!sync_handler.wait_for_reply(event_ptr))
00317         throw Exception(Protocol::response_code(event_ptr), (Protocol::string_format_message(event_ptr)));
00318 
00319     }
00320     else if (state.command == COMMAND_REPLAY_START) {
00321       m_range_server_ptr->replay_start(m_addr, &sync_handler);
00322       if (!sync_handler.wait_for_reply(event_ptr))
00323         throw Exception(Protocol::response_code(event_ptr), (Protocol::string_format_message(event_ptr)));
00324     }
00325     else if (state.command == COMMAND_REPLAY_LOG) {
00326       cout << "Not implemented." << endl;
00327     }
00328     else if (state.command == COMMAND_REPLAY_COMMIT) {
00329       m_range_server_ptr->replay_commit(m_addr, &sync_handler);
00330       if (!sync_handler.wait_for_reply(event_ptr))
00331         throw Exception(Protocol::response_code(event_ptr), (Protocol::string_format_message(event_ptr)));
00332     }
00333     else if (state.command == COMMAND_HELP) {
00334       const char **text = HqlHelpText::Get(state.str);
00335       if (text) {
00336         for (size_t i=0; text[i]; i++)
00337           cout << text[i] << endl;
00338       }
00339       else
00340         cout << endl << "no help for '" << state.str << "'" << endl << endl;
00341     }
00342     else if (state.command == COMMAND_SHUTDOWN) {
00343       m_range_server_ptr->shutdown(m_addr);
00344     }
00345     else
00346       throw Exception(Error::HQL_PARSE_ERROR, "unsupported command");
00347   }
00348   else
00349     throw Exception(Error::HQL_PARSE_ERROR, std::string("parse error at: ") + info.stop);
00350 }

00353 
00357 void RangeServerCommandInterpreter::display_scan_data(const ByteString &key, const ByteString &value, SchemaPtr &schemaPtr) {
00358   Key keyComps(key);
00359   Schema::ColumnFamily *cf;
00360 
00361   if (keyComps.flag == FLAG_DELETE_ROW) {
00362     cout << keyComps.timestamp << " " << keyComps.row << " DELETE" << endl;
00363   }
00364   else {
00365     if (keyComps.column_family_code > 0) {
00366       cf = schemaPtr->get_column_family(keyComps.column_family_code);
00367       if (keyComps.flag == FLAG_DELETE_CELL)
00368         cout << keyComps.timestamp << " " << keyComps.row << " " << cf->name << ":" << keyComps.column_qualifier << " DELETE" << endl;
00369       else {
00370         cout << keyComps.timestamp << " " << keyComps.row << " " << cf->name << ":" << keyComps.column_qualifier;
00371         cout << endl;
00372       }
00373     }
00374     else {
00375       cerr << "Bad column family (" << (int)keyComps.column_family_code << ") for row key " << keyComps.row;
00376       cerr << endl;
00377     }
00378   }
00379 }
